title: (12200) Onda - 2 Plaza Monti
description: Uneven concrete parking 800 meters from the Castle and historic center. Excellent solution in case of rain since the parking lot at the beginning of the village, although large, is on the ground and becomes mud. In this car park, if you have campers under 6 meters, re-enter the road markings.

title: (12200) Onda - 1 Calle Ingen Echegaray
description: Spacious and close to supermarkets.

title: (12200) Onda - 38 Avinguda Catalunya
description: Automatic laundry service every day of the year. The machines only take coins but there is a handy coin mechanism. Detergent and fabric softener included.

title: (12200) Onda - 30 Calle Fanzara
description: Onda Area (Castellón), It is a quiet, NON-guarded place ... very clean and it should continue like this. Let us give thanks to the capacity and attention of the municipality of Onda for a dignified and classy public service. Excellent maintenance. This gives the city a good image and life for tourism.

title: (12200) Onda - 63 Calle Poligono 32
description: Large picnic area with plenty of parking space.

title: (12221) Tales - 1 Partida Clot
description: Nice water fountain. Tap only no screw on.

title: (12210) Ribesalbes -
description: A really nice place. Just walk down 2 minutes and you are at the lake alone on the beach. We did a big paddleboard tour. However, staying overnight is not allowed!

name: Ribesalbes
title: (12210) Ribesalbes
description:
A very peaceful and quiet place on the shore of the reservoir. Watch the fish jump freely out of the water and enjoy the stillness with no light pollution. Access to the site is via the main road and follows the dirt track between the orange groves to the waterfront. Anything taller than 5m may struggle with the terrain.

We were very politely but firmly informed by the park attendant that overnight stays are not allowed.

title: (12200) Onda - 6 Calle Atalaya
description: Off season so absolutely no one else here.  Love it. The view just doesn’t get any better.  No facilities whatsoever not even a bin. But please take your rubbish home.  Some before haven’t.

title: (12223) Sueras - 9 Camino Onda
description: The town has a motorhome area, but it was full and we slept here. It is a quiet street.

title: (12210) Ribesalves - 14 Calle Poligono 26
description: Viewpoint of the swamp where to spend the night in case of emergency or not wanting to put the vehicle through a forest track. Clearly a place of passage where a couple of pedestrian downhill paths begin to the swamp. No services but perfect mobile coverage.

title: (12223) Sueras - Calle la Fuente
description: Municipal area with all services and 5 marked places. It is next to the hostel.Nice environment next to a hillside that faces north, within the Serra d'Espadà natural park.Beware of long motorhomes (more than 8 meters), because there is a slope that can complicate the access maneuver.

title: (12210) Ribesalbes -
description: Is only something for individualists

title: (12210) Ribesalves - 2 Avinguda D'onda
description: Handy village parking, and for water.

title: (12200) Onda - CV-189
description: Place located at the foot of the Sitjar reservoir. On the road that goes towards Ribesalbes, we take a path on the left (there is no signposting). It is a narrow, stony path with a slight descent. I would not recommend it for large motorhomes or vans. You can park when the road widens, even though I decided to go down to what is sensed to be part of the reservoir when they open the dam. The place is very quiet, I have been alone.

title: (12200) L'Alcora - Unnamed Road
description: 300m off the road down a slightly rough dirt track through the pines, fine for our car, very tall camper may not get down? soft branches though......beautiful dead end track with pines and other trees around, quiet and green. Flat place on track 100m before end. no amenities ;-)

title: (12210) Ribesalbes - Unnamed Road
description: At the end of the track that runs along the lake and just before the descent, flat place.

title: (12222) Alcudia de Veo - 2A Calle Benitandús
description: Benitandus is a town with no more services than two rural houses, but with a special charm, since not many people stop to discover its stream and the tranquility that is breathed at sunset. Not suitable for large ACs because the space is very small. People are very respectful and nice. On this occasion we have not stayed to sleep with the Camper because we had other plans, but we will once again enjoy this space that has amazed us. Let us be aware of the importance of keeping each place in its original state and not doing anything that could pollute or alter the environment.

title: (12210) Ribesalves - 20 Avinguda Eulogio Oset
description: A simple parking lot only for mobile homes. Drinking water at the well. Sports equipment in the immediate vicinity. Restaurants and village supermarket nearby, walking distance.

title: (12230) Fanzara - CV-20
description: Old abandoned road. ok for 1 night. quiet when we were here. little traffic on nearby road. it is level and about 5m wide. only eastern entrance is possible with motorhome due to trees.

title: (12230) Fanzara - 23 Lugar Poligono 4
description: Parking place with 8 spots, with a very flat parking spot above

title: (12230) Fanzara - 86 Lugar Poligono 4
description: Parking area day and night, there are 3 parking spaces not specific to motorhomes, with a small slope, but with the wedges it's perfect, next to is an area with 3 picnic tables, no service. Fanzara is a city highly recommended to visit for its urban paintings for all the facahadas of the houses.

title: (12230) Fanzara - Unnamed Road
description: 5 min from the village on foot. No problems parking and spending the night in February. lower river. access very sloping but doable with motorhome. take away your rubbish!

title: (12527) Artana - Ermita Santa Cristina
description: Artana has created a public parking for motorhomes that it finds located in Castelló Sud, a territory of ten municipalities that has a network of services for caravaning. This public, regulated parking lot is located in the area of the Ermita de Santa Cristina and has 4 spaces, without services. Among other attractions we find the most extensive mining area in the Valencian Community, castle, caves, ancient olive trees, birdwatching and gastronomy, among others.

title: (12527) Eslida - 3 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking at Santa Cristina hermitage with picnic tables and a small park for children, quite wide, gravel floor, two kilometers from the village.

title: (12223) -
description: Picnic area with barbecue and dumpster. Small parking space, but a couple of motor homes fit. in the middle of the Serra d'Espada. Beautiful site. Several easy trails leave the picnic area.

title: (12528) Eslida - Calle Camí Fons
description: Eslida has created a public parking for motorhomes that is located in Castelló Sud, a territory of ten municipalities that has a network of services for caravaning . It is a regulated public parking that has 3 spaces, without services. Other attractions include the Serra d'Espadà Natural Park interpretation center, trails, mountain biking, natural springs, castle, war heritage, caving, birdwatching, gastronomy (pot, soup rice, mountain paella ...)

title: (12222) Aín - 1 Partida Diseminados
description: Parking of the cemetery, flat, good views of the town, without services, but 5 minutes from the town on foot.

title: (12222) Aín - CV-223
description: Free parking in the village of Ain for private cars and small campers can park motorhome. It is located next to the entrance to the village roundabout, is close to a source of drinking water and garbage bins. Ideal for hiking trails in the area such as the climb to Espadán summit.

title: (12528) Eslida - 37 Carrer de les Corts Valencianes
title_short: (12528) Eslida - 37 Carrer de les Corts Valencianes
description: Road outside the town. Place to park and enjoy a good meal in the village. Area without any charm but very quiet to sleep.

name: Camping Municipal de Ayodar
title: (12224) Camping Municipal de Ayodar
description: Municipal camping of Ayodar. Situado en una ladera al on del pueblo, junto al rio apto para el baño y cerca la Fuente Larga. Con acceso to a multitud rutas of senderismo y próximo to the casco urbano, in donde to poder realizar the compras el supermercado, to ad pan panadía o tomar una copa en los bares. El precio incluye electricidad, WC, Agua drinking, barbacoas. A Favor Tranquilidad. Entorno precioso alrededor del camping Rutas de senderismo y rio próximo. WC, Agua Drinking, Electricidad antena TV. In Contra Acceso empinado y difícil para vehiculos grande. Pocas plazas. Pequeño Tamaño.

title: (12230) Espadilla - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place next to small river at the Ned of a small road. Not suitable for larger Campers. Max 5m.

title: (12550) Almazora - 2 Avenida Boverot
description: It has double height to wash the motorhome and the roof

title: (12550) Almazora - 305 Calle 01
description: It is a closed and guarded parking with cameras. There is a lot of truck and each parking lot is delimited. They have electrical connection for parking lots and wiffi5 throughout the enclosure. there is an area of toilets with showers, quite clean, community room with air conditioning and vending machines for food, drink and coffee. It includes a microwave. in the toilets there is a washer and dryer. barbecue and dining area. light throughout the enclosure.

title: (12499) Chóvar - CV-219
description: In the mountains in the Natural Park of the Sierra between Chóvar and Eslida, without service only nature. It is probably forbidden to stay over night in the nature park, but it is worthwhile to spend the day here.

title: (12224) Vilamalur - Unnamed Road
description: Superb recreational aera in full nature. Beautiful hikes. Ruins of the castle. Water on the village square. Nice bar

title: (12540) Vila-real - 300 Carrer Ermita
description: Parking next to the Hermitage. Green area near a river with tables for picknick. Pool and restorante next. No posters of proibido dormir.Zona very quiet at night, there is some shade. During the day it is full of people who come to walk.

title: (12222) Alcudia de Veo - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent mountain panorama, gravel road

title: (12526) La Vilavella - 387 Partida Castell
description: Public parking. Regulated parking. Places 2. No services. Starting point of several trails, spa and museum of the 'espardenyers' (footwear from the early twentieth century), via ferrara, birdwatching, viewpoint, gastronomy ...

title: (12110) L'Alcora - 10 Plaça Poligono 19
description: Busy site of traffic but to spend one night is correct

title: (12499) Chóvar - CV-219
description: Picnic area in a very beautiful environment, with barbecue; the parking lot is not badly leveled for motorhomes, be careful when entering with the branches of the trees which are a little low and glued to the roof, there is an escape zone to avoid touching them.

title: (12526) La Vilavella - 7 Urbanizacion Santa Barbara Q
title_short: (12526) La Vilavella - 7 Urbanizacion Santa Barbara Q
description: Quiet parking where to spend the night. Beautiful sunrise views

title: (12190) Castellón de la Plana - 11 Partida Benadresa P 38
title_short: (12190) Castellón de la Plana - 11 Partida Benadresa P 38
description: Service station with shop, bread, cafeteria, large parking and hot shower with toilet inside.

title: (12540) Vila-real - 48 Avinguda Alemanya
description:
Parking near the La Cerámica stadium and the center of Villarreal.

Easy access. Without services but with restaurants, bars and a park nearby.

title: (12526) La Vilavella - Calle Valencia
description: La Vilavella has created a public parking for motorhomes that it finds located in Castelló Sud, a territory of ten municipalities that has a network of services for caravanning . This regulated public parking has 2 spaces, without services. Among the attractions of interest are the spa, its castle, the grotto of Our Lady of Lourdes (reproduction of the grotto of the French town of the same name, built in the 80s), the Alpargateros Museum, viewpoint, mining area 'Camí La Mina 'and the via ferrara La Cantera. Also to highlight the gastronomy of the area.

title: (12540) Vila-real - 136 Avinguda Arcadi Garcia Sanz
description: Water point Next to the carefour, no height restriction, didn’t spend the night but looks like you could. Stopped to buy some food and accidentally found a water tap just as we were starting to loose hope.

title: (12230) Argelita - 11-13 CV-194
description: Small recreational area with fountain. Close to the highway. Good shady spot to spend the day and enjoy Del Rio. Work tables and chairs

title: (12110) L'Alcora - 31 Calle Camino Ermita San Vicente
title_short: (12110) L'Alcora - 31 Calle Camino Ermita San Vicente
description: A rest area for walkers, on the street that goes to the hermitage. We don't really know if it's legal to stop there, but we spent a very quiet night under the trees.

title: (12110) L'Alcora - 29 Calle Hermano Martín Salvador
description: Free camping area with all kinds of services. It is a place surrounded by pine trees, there is no gray and black drainage service, but it has clean bathrooms, clean water, sinks and barbecues.

title: (12609) Alfondeguilla - Camí La Palanca, s/n
description: Alfondeguilla has created a public parking lot for motorhomes that it finds located in Castelló Sud, a territory of ten municipalities that has a network of services for caravaning. This regulated public parking is located very close to the urban area and has 2 spaces, without services. Among other attractions, it is worth highlighting the Castro castle, the Castellet and the Calvario, the Castro fridge (an old construction for storing snow and later obtaining ice), a great wealth of natural sources and birdwatching, in addition to the rich gastronomy of the region. zone.

title: (12540) Vila-real - 103 Avinguda França
description:
Very clean OpenBlue laundromat. clothes dryer. Special machine for animal cushions. Payment center that takes note and coin but not CB. Coffee and soda machine. Easy to park even large motorhome.
Just in front drinking water fountain in operation and garbage bin.

title: (12600) La Vall d'Uixó - 22 Barrio Carbonaire Cl 1
title_short: (12600) La Vall d'Uixó - 22 Barrio Carbonaire Cl 1
description:
Dead end street with no houses around, at the foot of the mountain in a very quiet neighborhood.
Alternative place to the caravan area of the Grutas de San José (only three minutes by car), which is usually quite saturated much of the year. Ideal if you are looking to escape from the masses and be alone.
Without traffic or people, lit at night, right next to the mountain and in the back of a school.
Next to it is a stone bench in the shade of some trees. A few streets down is the Eva bakery.

title: (12529) Nules - 120 Partida Cantalobos
description: Wasteland

title: (12529) Nules - 5 Partida Recholi 1 Andan
description: This is a market area used on a Sunday all year . Good and level across from the walled town.

title: (12230) Argelita - 14 CV-193
description: À flat place with an amazing view of the mountains (you can see Peñagolosa). Next to a road with very little traffic. Great for a little break, a picnic, or a night for the brave ones (it’s quite windy!). There are a few semi-inhabited villages around. Enjoy ☺️

title: (12414) Algimia de Almonacid - CV-215
description: Waterpoint, water from mountain. Good taste, it takes 3 minutes to fill 13 liter.

title: (12600) La Vall d'Uixó - Passeig de les Grutes, 6
title_short: (12600) La Vall d'Uixó - Passeig de les Grutes, 6
description: The La Vall d'Uixó motorhome area is located in Castelló Sud, a territory of ten municipalities that has a network of services for caravanning . This parking lot has 8 spaces and is located in the Coves Sant Josep area. It has a tap for water supply (free). The motorhomes cannot be more than 48 hours, camping elements such as tables, chairs, clotheslines or barbecues are not allowed outside. Neither can spills be made outside the service area, and the area must be kept in a perfect state of cleanliness. Other attractions include the Coves de Sant Josep, with the longest navigable underground river in Europe. This place is also a very interesting archaeological site declared a Site of Cultural Interest. It is also worth highlighting the XYZ Line and mountain paths, a heritage that originates from the Spanish Civil War. La Vall d'Uixó also has an important network of trails and birdwatching.

title: (12121) L'Alcora - 306 Plaça Poligono 45
description: At the end of an approx. 800m long, narrow gravel road you reach a beautiful place directly at a fork under coniferous trees. One enjoys the view into the distance and the shade provided by the trees.

title: (12225) Les Fonts d'Aiòder - 28 Carretera Aiòder
description: Small car park with some difficulty to enter because it is narrow. Not recommended for very large or wide vehicles. The advantage is that it is flat and is in the middle of town.

title: (12413) Almedíjar - CV-200
description: LOS PINOS RECREATIONAL AREA Picnic area with playground and water fountain.

title: (12121) L'Alcora - 187 Plaça Poligono 3
description: Small road edge. In nature. Well to walk to the castle and hermit of the Alcalaten in La Foia. Great view once arrived. This afternoon we will see the dam at LA Foia 2 km. There is a parking lot apparently on earth. To have.

title: (12499) Chóvar -
description: Quiet place with picnic - possibility

title: (12190) Urbanització Vall d'Umbri - Unnamed Road
description:
Asphalt public car park at exit 18 of the CV-10, a great place to stop for a technical stop or to spend the night. During the day it is usually quite crowded.
At the entrance the height is limited to 2.50 meters.
There is a dumpster.

title: (12600) La Vall d'Uixó - 1A Plaça del Mercat
title_short: (12600) La Vall d'Uixó - 1A Plaça del Mercat
description: A simple large and spacious parking lot to stop for a moment and do some shopping.

title: (12190) Borriol - 248E Calle 10
description:
Land wasteland where the residents of the urbanization park their cars. Quiet area at the exit of the roundabout, easily accessible from the CV-10 motorway.
Several garbage containers for recycling.

title: (12119) L'Alcora - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet parking dam of La Foia.

title: (12530) Burriana - 447 E-15
description: Picnic area with tables and restrooms. Ideal for a stop next to the highway. There is shade, bathrooms and the possibility of taking water (not drinkable).

title: (12600) La Vall d'Uixó - 23 Carrer Comercial la Travessa
title_short: (12600) La Vall d'Uixó - 23 Carrer Comercial la Travessa
description: Large parking in front of a CompraB supermarket and gas station. Possible to stay overnight in front of the supermarket. You are at the gas station, it is against the wall. You also have a Lidl next door, and just after the supermarket.

title: (12006) Castelló de la Plana - 127 Calle Grecia
title_short: (12006) Castelló de la Plana - 127 Calle Grecia
description: Parking in front of the Decathlon and next to the shopping center. Many places.

title: (12413) Almedíjar - 62 Polígono Número 7
description: Newly enabled free area. There are two places as a possibility of payment electricity and discharge of gray water. Good initiative from the town hall that will surely go further.

title: (12600) La Vall d'Uixó - 5 Carrer Pati d'Adobers
title_short: (12600) La Vall d'Uixó - 5 Carrer Pati d'Adobers
description: New laundry in the Uixo Valley. Next to a gas station and in front of Mercadona. We left the laundry and took the opportunity to shop.

title: (12413) Almedíjar - Polígono Número 7
description: Picnic area and walking area in the town of Almejidar. at the end of paseo g there is a closed factory with plenty of room. there is also a cemented esplanade as a parking lot at the entrance to the town. village located under the Espadan peak. many routes leave from here that are very beautiful. take care of the environment. thanks

title: (12520) Nules - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Galp gas station with free air and water

title: (12414) Algimia de Almonacid - CV-215
description: Quiet and beautiful place to spend the night with different bases of transparent water for swimming

title: (12415) Matet - Unnamed Road
description: Fairly level dirt parking next to the spring that rises

title: (12530) Borriana - 4 Plaça Fira
description: Public parking at the entrance of the town. No services. It does not specify A/C or overnight prohibition. I have spent two nights here with a campervan and no problem.

title: (12006) Castelló de la Plana - 85 Carrer del Riu Xúquer
title_short: (12006) Castelló de la Plana - 85 Carrer del Riu Xúquer
description: Huge parking space where you can park for the night. No facilities but right next to a large shopping center with all kinds of restaurants and a bowling alley. Also near an indoor pool.

title: (12550) Almassora - 69 Avinguda de Castelló
description: Petrol station located next to a Mercadona. Free toilets next to the reception and water refill for 1euro for 5min. Located in front of a small bar.

title: (12122) Figueroles - 8 Calle Proyecto
description: Quiet place next to the river to eat or rest for a while.

title: (12006) Castelló de la Plana - 126 Avinguda de València
title_short: (12006) Castelló de la Plana - 126 Avinguda de València
description:
Self Service Laundry in the Repsol garage. 
Tight for parking a motorhome but Lidl is down the road 150 meters away and you could park there.
Soap and softener included in wash.

title: (12006) Castelló de la Plana - 26 Carrer del Riu Adra
title_short: (12006) Castelló de la Plana - 26 Carrer del Riu Adra
description: Laundry . From 4 euros washing machine and dryer from 2 euros

title: (12550) - 106A Partida San Antonio
description:
Friends club
House No. 106A green gate.

in the middle of orange plantations,
4 camper pitches, completely fenced, guarded and lighted.
WIFI incl.
family atmosphere.

We speak German English, Spanish, please register one hour in advance.
Mercadona 1.2km, beach 4km. Market day Tuesday and Friday.
WhatsApp possible.

title: (12414) Vall de Almonacid - 35 Avenida de Los Hermanos Don Miguel Y.Jesus Perez Rodriguez
title_short: (12414) Vall de Almonacid - 35 Avenida de Los Hermanos Don Miguel Y.Jesus Perez Rodriguez
description: Gray and black water loading and emptying service point. Next to the road and a recycling point. Overnight stays are not allowed. Be careful when leaving as it is going uphill to the road and you can rub the underside very easily (it would be advisable to lower it). Thanks to the City Council for enabling an area like this.

address.street: 35 Avenida de Los Hermanos Don Miguel Y.Jesus Perez Rodriguez

title: (12004) Castellón de la Plana - Autopista del Mediterráneo
title_short: (12004) Castellón de la Plana - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Gas station with a good price, quiet facilities to recharge water, and empty black and gray free service whenever we consume in its facilities fuel cafeteria car wash.

title: (12520) Nules - 1 Partida Belcaire
description: Huge abandoned holiday resort, free access no fences, with empty buildings and big empty spaces. Very interesting to walk around.

title: (12123) Giraba de Abajo -
description: Old viewpoint at the foot of a road with little traffic, but surrounded by vegetation and with stone benches. Very quiet and with spectacular views.

title: (12006) Castelló de la Plana - 3 Carrer d'Escalante
title_short: (12006) Castelló de la Plana - 3 Carrer d'Escalante
description: La Colada self-service laundry, hours from 9:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

title: (12190) Borriol -
description: Place on the street is rarely driven, fit 3 cars, lower place is nicer.

title: (12190) Borriol - 11 Carrer Remolins
description:
Picnic area with parking in the old town of Borriol, upper area.
Narrow streets accessible for low volume vans.

title: (12530) Borriana - 2-4 Carrer Malta
description: Very quiet parking space between the barely used road and the beach. Quite clean, large trash cans right at the parking lot. The sea is barely visible through a small wall, but is only 30 meters away

title: (12530) Borriana - 322D Camí la Serratella
description: Public water access with parking in front, good water pressure. However, no screw connection is possible, you can only put the hose on it or hold/place a canister underneath

title: (12004) Castelló de la Plana - 33 Avinguda de Barcelona
title_short: (12004) Castelló de la Plana - 33 Avinguda de Barcelona
description: Overnight parking near the center of the city of Castellón.

title: (12530) Borriana - 29 Avinguda Vicent Cañada Blanch
description: Street in urbanization. No services. We have used it for dinner and to spend the night after being unable to park near the sea or the beach. Street not very busy where we have been able to sleep peacefully and without problem. ample place to enter with a large motorhome.

title: (12530) - 6C Camí el Marge
description: Tap water

title: (12004) Castelló de la Plana - 7R Calle Pl Numero 123
title_short: (12004) Castelló de la Plana - 7R Calle Pl Numero 123
description: Hidden place (parking lot for climbers). Entry is for vehicles with ground clearance only.

title: (12190) Borriol - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice offroad place max 1 car.

title: (12530) Borriana - 50 Carrer les Alqueries
description:
Quiet to spend a few days by the sea, in this case prefer to go to the bottom towards the other "nature" spot on the right by taking the small path between the beach and the houses.
There are even trash cans there!

title: (12119) Costur - 31 Calle Loma Blanca
description: COSTUR Nice little village in the mountains. Stop at a very nice picnic area, very clean tarmac location very nice view very quiet place to rest. You can go hiking and mountain biking.

title: (12530) Borriana - 17 Carrer les Alqueries
description:
Beautiful cove perfect for spending a few nights. great for dogs and kids. great for swimming and walking. 

fairly flat and room enough for around 3 vans. no trouble for access in a 3.5T motorhome and bar is 500m up the road. 

nice and quiet all night/ morning and a few fishermen and swimmers in the evening. 

no services but large garbage bins and not far from town to buy groceries and there is a motorhome disposal area in a bar up the road( wouldnt recommend staying there. very unwelcoming)...

title: (12190) Borriol - 45 Pintor Sorolla
description: Quiet place to spend the night. Asphalted and without services. There are swings for children and it is an ideal area for excursions to the mountain.

title: () Sant Joan de Moró - Camí de Sant Miquel
title_short: () Sant Joan de Moró - Camí de Sant Miquel
description: Hermitage surrounded by nature, good access for any vehicle. It is a dirt track but it is very good. There are a several sources and routes to do. Quiet place to spend the night a few km from Villafames, San Joan de Moro ... If you use it, please keep it clean. Since everything that is not taken care of ends up spoiling and that here means that they will forbid us to spend the night.

title: (12004) Castelló de la Plana - 9009R Calle Pl Numero 123
title_short: (12004) Castelló de la Plana - 9009R Calle Pl Numero 123
description: A small parking lot right on the street. We don't know if one is tolerated at night ort. Nice view and a climbing area right next to it (Castellet - La Coma Alta)

title: (12002) Castelló de la Plana - 27 Carrer de Sagasta
title_short: (12002) Castelló de la Plana - 27 Carrer de Sagasta
description: Automatic laundry

title: (12130) Sant Joan de Moró - Urbanització Mas D Armelers
title_short: (12130) Sant Joan de Moró - Urbanització Mas D Armelers
description: Hermitage of San Vicente. It has picnic areas and a playground for children with zip line ... There are no amenities but it is a quiet place to spend the night. Access is by track. Only suitable for vans or 4x4.

title: (12520) Nules - 14 Camí de Cabeçol
description: Picnic area located in the Nules duck pond (beach) ideal for eating at their tables in the shade. The beach is only 100mt (beach of stones and sand). It has enough room to park.

name: Lavanderia Autoservicio PATYNACHO
title: (12005) Lavanderia Autoservicio PATYNACHO
description: Public laundry with large and medium size washers, plus dryers.

address.street: 10 Carrer de Santa Cruz de Teijeiro

title: (12520) Nules - zone Els Estanys
description: Nules has created a public parking lot for motorhomes that it finds located in Castelló Sud, a territory of ten municipalities that has a network of services for caravaning . This regulated public parking is located on the coast, very close to the beach and next to the Estanys de Nules. It has 4 seats, without services. Among the attractions to highlight are the beach, lakes, mountain biking, trails, oranges, birdwatching, the Enrique Giner medal museum (unique in Spain), the Discalced Carmelite convent, etc. Do not miss the small fortified enclosure of Mascarell, unique in the entire Valencian Community, and where currently about 200 people still live.

title: (12529) Nules - 109 Avenida Islas Columbretes
description: Parking spot near holiday accommodation, right by the beach. Relatively flat and loose stones. May be difficult if bigger than 7m van or motorhome. Potentially very busy on season. Showers on the beach (not available off season). Round the corner from a campervan service area. Civil guard seek to have no issue. Space is used for bin collections.

title: (12120) Llucena - 3 Calle en Proyecto
description: Motorhome area, public, urban, with gray water, black water and drinking water services with a token that can be obtained at the town hall tourist office, very quiet and with views of the mountains (with restaurants, bars, supermarket, routes for walking, bathing areas)

title: (12520) Platja de Nules - 102 Travessia Plana Baixa
title_short: (12520) Platja de Nules - 102 Travessia Plana Baixa
description: Sand parking that fits all types of vans, caravans, trailers .... 5 meters from the beach. The beach has showers and foot washes. July and August full but with plenty of room. Rest of the year a very quiet relaxed area. Round stones beach. In front of some dunes. Where to eat: a pizzeria that opens almost all year or a restaurant that has a menu during the week. The town of Nules is 4.5 km away. Moncofar beach at 2km. If you are looking for something to be sleeping peacefully this is the ideal place. Zen zone

title: (12530) Borriana - 5 Carrer Torre del Mar
description: Great location. right near a 3 km walking track. there is a fountain and a stone beach. lots of locals walk past in the evenings but they don't seem to mind. No overnight allowed

title: (12190) Borriol - CV-10
description: Asphalt car park next to a church, with green and recreation areas for children. No services. Good option to stop and eat. Too noisy to sleep. Highway very close and a lot of traffic

title: (12530) Burriana - 27 Calle Gravina
description: Parking for 5 bedrooms facing the sea with pétanque pitch next door

title: (12530) Borriana - 14 Carrer les Terrasses
description: Parking area on the street in the first row of the beach. Fishing area and local people. We have had a very quiet night. In the first hour athletes and people with dogs passed by but it is very little traveled. Very good place to rest and spend some night.

title: (12520) Platja de Nules - Camí de les Serratelles
title_short: (12520) Platja de Nules - Camí de les Serratelles
description: Smaller parking space right on the beach. The driveway is a bit steep and you should drive in carefully. There is little traffic on the road.

title: (12529) El Grau de Moncofa - 64 Partida Serratelles
title_short: (12529) El Grau de Moncofa - 64 Partida Serratelles
description: Parking area 50m from the beach, easy access by dirt road. quiet and next to the campsite

name: Camping Playa Costa De Levante
title: (12529) Camping Playa Costa De Levante
description: Motorhome pitch with electricity. (not high season), water, Wi-Fi. The plots are large and face the sea with no view. The support from the staff is fantastic and helpful. A privileged place with direct access to the beach.

title: (12003) Castelló de la Plana - 113 Carrer del Bisbe Salinas
title_short: (12003) Castelló de la Plana - 113 Carrer del Bisbe Salinas
description: It is a very convenient parking ten minutes walk from the city. There is a supermarket Mercadona just opposite and a carrefour 5 min walk. In addition there is also a tram stop to go to other areas of the city.

name: Camping Monmar ****
title: (12593) Camping Monmar ****
description: Quiet family campsite with large plots (70m2) with electricity connection, water connection and sink on the plot, 2 swimming pools, children's area, restaurant, full bathrooms, laundry and the possibility of filling and emptying water. Located 200m from the beach and close to shops and businesses. Ideal for walking and cycling routes. Special prices for retirees in low season.

title: (12231) Cirat - 16 Plaça Poligono 1
description: Quiet esplanade has a couple of stones that serve as a table. There are no tables to remove or anything.

title: (12593) El Grau de Moncofa - 311 Avinguda Mare Nostrum
title_short: (12593) El Grau de Moncofa - 311 Avinguda Mare Nostrum
description: End of the boardwalk, close to the highway. quiet night by the sea, in high season I doubt I can spend the night

title: (12530) - 19 Partida Turrucles
description: Next to an industrial building. Quiet and without street noise. We were alone, no pedestrians on the beach.

title: () Castelló de la Plana - Ronda Circunvalación
title_short: () Castelló de la Plana - Ronda Circunvalación
description: Parking of the auditorium. Quiet area, next to a park, ideal to see Castellón.

title: (12530) Borriana - CV-1850
description: Quiet corner by the river, very pleasant to stop. Please note, difficult to access for large motorhomes.

title: (12593) El Grau de Moncofa - 1 Carrer Santa Pola
title_short: (12593) El Grau de Moncofa - 1 Carrer Santa Pola
description: In total 2 washing machines and 1 dryer 18 kg (regarding the prices in the photos: it has become more expensive - from 3/11 22) Coin operated to all Machines only with coins, but machine to change available Choice between 20°/30°/40° at no extra cost (status 3.11.22)

title: (12192) Vilafamés - 104 Plaça Poligono 16
description: Quiet place, there is no parking as such and the space is limited. It is good to spend the night and it is a passage area for GRs. There are no facilities of any kind.

title: (12003) Castellón de la Plana - 8 Calle José María Guinot Galán
title_short: (12003) Castellón de la Plana - 8 Calle José María Guinot Galán
description: Parking for motorhomes in the shopping center, with a gas station nearby. No problems for the night.

title: (12593) Moncófar - Moncofa, av. d’Espanya
description: The Moncofa motorhome area is located in Castelló Sud, a territory of ten municipalities that has a network of services for caravaning . It is close to the center, has 30 seats and has the possibility of emptying and filling water (free). The motorhomes cannot be more than 48 hours, camping elements such as tables, chairs, clotheslines or barbecues are not allowed outside. Neither can spills be made outside the service area, and the area must be kept in a perfect state of cleanliness. Among its attractions are its beaches of different physiognomies, where you can practice all kinds of water sports or calmly enjoy contact with nature. Also review the hermitage of Santa María Magdalena, which symbolizes what was once the maritime town of El Grao, and the possibility of birdwatching, among other issues of interest.

title: (12100) Castelló de la Plana - 129R Calle Pl Numero 139
title_short: (12100) Castelló de la Plana - 129R Calle Pl Numero 139
description: Very pleasant quiet church car park. Public toilets adjacent and drinking water fountains in front of church. Lack of shade but perfect spot for overnighting. Very good bike paths pass nearby.

title: (12120) Llucena - CV-190
description: At 1000m altitude in the countryside 300m from the road by road very drivable. superb view of Els Ports Mountains and the Sierra. on a clear day, possibly overlooking the sea.

title: (12593) El Grao de Moncófar - 36A Calle Proyecto 10
title_short: (12593) El Grao de Moncófar - 36A Calle Proyecto 10
description: Drinking water fountain in children's park

title: (12004) Castelló de la Plana - 12 Partida Canet
title_short: (12004) Castelló de la Plana - 12 Partida Canet
description: Picnic area next to a hermitage surrounded by orange groves. There is abundant shade and a source of drinking water. There are 8 picnic tables and room to park a large RV out front.

title: (12480) Soneixa - 38 Calle Fuentes
description:
Camping tables by the river. To bathe, have a picnic.
-There is a fountain and garbage a few meters away.
-Next to town with all services (including a supermarket that opens on Sundays and holidays), but quiet.
-You can park in the surroundings to sleep in the shade (look for holes in the roads).

title: (46593) Algar - 282 Poligono 5
description: Picnic area with tables and barbecues and fountain

title: (12591) La Llosa - Área recreativa, carrer Séquia
title_short: (12591) La Llosa - Área recreativa, carrer Séquia
description: La Llosa has created a public parking for motorhomes that is located in Castelló Sud, a territory of ten municipalities that has a network of services for caravaning. It is a regulated public parking that has 4 spaces 4, without services. Other attractions include the virgin beach with an accessible wooden walkway, picnic area, trails, the Paraje del Carcau, Font del Carcau and Font Redona (a natural water spring that is a symbol for the population), els Pouets, the wet area de Marjal (with rich vegetation and migratory birds), ultralight aerodrome next to the coast and birdwatching.

title: (12489) Sot de Ferrer - 22 Calle Progreso
description: Parking at the entrance to the village Sot de Ferrer. We stopped to eat en route and it is very quiet, spacious and clean. The town has a bakery and butcher nearby, although we did not stay.

title: (12591) La Llosa - 946 N-340
description: Free water refill

title: (12530) Burriana - Camí del Palaciet
description: Ü place right on the beach

title: (46593) Valencia - 469 Poligono 13
description: Parking and a few picnic tables next to the dam. Calmed down.

title: (12414) Sogorb - 143 Plaça Poligono 04
description: New pk of the Peñalba pool. Quiet place close to the town. Nice views of Segorbe and the entire plain of the Palancia River. Good place for excursions and sightseeing

title: (12118) Les Useres - Font de la Ponsa
title_short: (12118) Les Useres - Font de la Ponsa
description: In the middle of the countryside, a picnic area summarily arranged around a small spring. Rustic and bucolic, perfect for starry and quiet nights.

title: (12530) Borriana - Unnamed Road
description: Google suggested the way, here you are alone. Sea reachable in 1 minute walk, path is not very easy to reach with high cars, no asphalt road and high reeds reaching into the paths.

name: Camping Naranjos
title: (12593) Camping Naranjos
description: Large, friendly and clean campsite. Huge pitches. Very quiet (on the outskirts). 5 minutes from the sea. They allow pets. Good for cycle touring. In summer, camper dinner with festivals on Saturday nights!! Necessary pool hat. French, German, Italian, English are spoken ...

title: (46593) Algar de Palancia -
description:
Esplanade in the middle of nature with plenty of space and surrounded by mandarin and orange plantations.

It is easily accessed from the road by a 200m dirt and stone track. Accessible to any vehicle. Quick access from the highway, 5min approx.

Once there you find yourself surrounded by a small valley of plantations and forest. Very calm.

On that road only a few cars pass a day and some neighbors walking.

Perhaps the only drawback is that you can hear the road and the train in the distance.

There is mobile coverage, although it depends on the company it can be scarce. Movistar has little coverage, but Orange has good coverage.

The place is located about 20 minutes walk from the small town of Algar de Palancia. There is a bakery, a butcher, a couple of bars and a grocery store that is also open on weekend mornings where you can buy food if you need something.

If you need to make a big purchase you can go to Sagunt by highway in 15 minutes.

At the entrance to the town there is a fountain next to the road where you can fill up with water.

It is a charming place full of trails for nature excursions. Very sunny most of the day. Ideal for cold season.

title: (12232) Aranyel - 1 Partida Fuente Seguer
description: Parking at the source of Follow, conditioned by the town hall. You can spend the night and next to it there are picnic benches and a fountain that, although it says "not suitable for human consumption", is because it is not subjected to periodic analysis. The townspeople drink it and we drink it too, without any problem. Following the path there is a pool of fresh water to bathe in and it is very good. There is a treatment plant in the town, which smells less on the left side, on the right side it smells something else ...... it is recommended to park on the left side of the treatment plant ..... Super quiet and a wonderful town that is committed to eliminating the gender violence.

title: (12550) Almassora - 467B Paseo Marítimo
description: Parking close to the beach and a children's playground. no service, we spent a very quiet night, nice sunrise. We preferred this place to that located at a hundred meters. a very quiet place at this time (winter)

title: (12550) Castelló - 337D Urbanizacion el Chopar
description: Next to the beach but separate, there is a market on Sundays but at the moment it is closed. separated from the beach so as not to be very visible. No prohibition sign.

title: (12550) Almazora - 210 Partida Playa Torre
description: Small open space right in front of the beach, room for 2 ac, good place to stop or spend the day at most. several neighbors offered us drinking water

name: Geldo
title: (12412) Geldo
description:
Geldo is a town in the Alto Palancia region, in the province of Castellón in the Valencian Community. It has a network of services for caravaning. Geldo is a charming town, it is small but very active. It has an excellent location and communication, it is next to the municipality of Segorbe where all covered services are located and the beach is only thirty minutes away.

It has 5 places and water. Among the attractions to highlight are the Parish Church of Nuestra Señora de la Misericordia and the Palace of the Dukes of Medinacelli, designated a site of cultural interest and which is currently in the process of being restored to include new facilities such as a museum and a cultural center. The two emblematic fountains of the town also stand out: La Fuente del Cristo and La Fuente de San Gil, with large gardens and recreational areas.

title: (46593) Algar de Palancia - 16 Avenida Jaime I
title_short: (46593) Algar de Palancia - 16 Avenida Jaime I
description:
Drinking fountain on the sidewalk next to the road. Very easy to fill water. good pressure.

You will need a universal snap-on adapter like the one seen in the photos. They can be bought on amazon and they work for any faucet that doesn't have a thread.

You have to stop in the middle of the road, but it is the access to Algar de Palancia, a small town with little traffic.

title: (12550) Almazora - 487 Calle 13
description: Hard sand parking without any service, spend a night without problem, no prohibition no service but very beautiful view.

title: (12550) Almassora - 54 Partida Catalans Urb
description: A parking lot without any specific service. There is a fountain where you can wash your hands or fill a water bottle. Quiet. Nobody bothered us.

title: (12489) Sot de Ferrer - CS-V-6021
description: Large gravel parking lot. You have to look for a place that is straight. You can hear a little bit on the highway. Just for a stopover

title: (12400) Sogorb - 209C Polígono 04
description: From the source of the 50 pipes, continue a little until we see a bridge that crosses the river, we cross the bridge and turn right for a minute or so until we find some stone tables. There is shaded space for several vehicles. I have spent the night here, very quiet place, no noise except the course of the river, there is little lighting along the way, so there is no influx of people at night, during the day there are hardly any people since beyond is the waterfall girlfriend and the rock prefer to stuff themselves like sheep, I was yesterday and I had to go. The river is dirty, there are plastics everywhere and I have seen diapers in the river and in the bushes that I will later collect, I take a bag full of plastics. Leave the best place it was.

title: (12232) Arañuel - 5E Calle Molino
description: Next to the natural pools of the river. Barely local pilgrimage site. Incredibly cool bathroom. Abundant shade. To stop and cool off. To sleep it could be worth. Narrow and sloping access, but vans ok.

title: (12400) Segorbe - 21 Sector Estación
description: Free area with water and sewage. Water via push button with high water pressure. A small screw valve is required. It is located near the train station and the city centre with shopping facilities.

title: (12470) Navajas - 55 Calle Vicente Mortes
description: Parking for vehicles under 3.5tons, as well as some tables and benches.

title: (12400) Sogorb - 169 Polígono 04
description: Lovely spot at the Fuenta. We just came to see the Fuenta but found it could be a great place to sleep over the next time we come this way.

title: (12400) Segorbe - N-234
description: Service station parking, with small cafe friendly restaurant. Just for the night or stop coffee lunch. no service. can be water by asking at the gas station. Good parking.

title: (12400) Segorbe - Calle Sir Alexander Fleming
description: Ideal for overnight if the area is full. Quiet area, level and with a fountain.

title: (12470) Navajas - 12 Calle Bajada al Nogueral
description: La Playeta picnic area next to El Nogueral, on the outskirts of Navajas. Right on the banks of the Palancia river where it is possible to swim and have a picnic (no barbecue). There is no express prohibition on overnight stays, so that decision is left to the discretion of the user. In September it is already low season and there has been no problem. Access is easy for midsize vans but somewhat fair for GV and AC.

title: (12450) Jérica - CV-213
description: Nice place at the lake, non-busy road nearby. Sorrounded by nature, no services.

title: (12400) Segorbe - 2 Calle Sociedad Musical
description: Laundry with 2 dryers 2 washing machines 17 kg and 2 washing machines 13 kg. One of the 13 kg machines is intended for pets. Money changer. The washing machines can be set to 22°, 40°, 60° and 75°C. In front of the store, there are two vending machines for snacks and drinks. From the RV park it's only a 5 minute walk to the laundromat

title: (12592) Chilches - 55 Calle Sebastián Elcano
description: Parking on the beach where you can stay day and night without problems

title: (12118) Castellón - 5 Partida Vila Vella
description: Picnic area next to a source of untreated water and a small river. The parking area is paved and level with some shade. During the day there is movement of people who come to get water from the source.

title: (12120) Lucena del Cid - CV-1740
description: Highway margin, for 1 AC.

title: (12400) Segorbe - 25 Calle Sagunto
description: Self-service laundry, Lacolada You can park very close, in the Mercadona uncovered car park

title: (12400) Sogorb - 12 Calle la Enrramada
description: Sports center paid 2.70 for showering, changing rooms with hot water, bathroom and mirror. The girl at the reception super friendly.

title: (46594) Alfara de la Baronia - 17 Carrer Font d'Arguines
title_short: (46594) Alfara de la Baronia - 17 Carrer Font d'Arguines
description: Quiet place, at the end of the road, at the historic site "Acequia Ruta del Agua".

title: (12004) Castellón de la Plana - CV-147
description: Las Palmas desert parking lot. We went there probably after an event so garbage everywhere, papers and cans thrown on the ground. So very dirty place. We must be able to spend the night there. Castle and hermitage just above the car park.

title: (12100) El Grao de Castellón - 11 Carrer d'Eivissa
title_short: (12100) El Grao de Castellón - 11 Carrer d'Eivissa
description: A small, not very clean laundry.

title: (12400) Segorbe - 24A Calle Obispo Pont Gol
description: Public parking in the upper area of Segorbe, next to the Segobriga Park water park. Well leveled, it has a container. At night almost no cars pass, quiet place. It is unprotected without trees, on windy days it can be somewhat uncomfortable.

title: (12470) Navajas - 51 Avenida Fuente del Baño
description: Ideal point to stop or even spend the night in the van. It is a small corner next to the road, with trees and a descent to the river, where you can bathe very comfortably. There are no tables, no trash cans, just a bank.

title: (12400) - 47 Avenida Juan Carlos I
description: Street parking, free and overnight allowed. Lots of trucks parked in the area because there are security cameras installed. Not beautiful but the added security of the cameras gives peace of mind

name: Camping Monte de San Blas
title: (12400) Camping Monte de San Blas
description: Camping Monte de San Blas. It is a newly created campsite, located on the Monte de San Blás, 5 minutes from the town of Segorbe and the Renfe Segorbe-Arrabal train station. Nearby you can find Segóbriga Park, which is a water park.

name: Camping - Bungalows Altomira
title: (12470) Camping - Bungalows Altomira
description:
We have not stayed over for the night. But it has all the services and in the middle of nature.
The restaurant very well.
We will be back.

title: (12100) El Grao de Castellón - 24 Passeig - Paseo de Sebastián Elcano
title_short: (12100) El Grao de Castellón - 24 Passeig - Paseo de Sebastián Elcano
description: Laundromat

title: (12400) Sogorb - N-234
description: Great place for a bit of wild camping. No services at all but close to both Segorbe plus Navajas. Cycling, walking , or just relaxing.

title: (12592) Chilches - 1 Calle Tres
description: Parking lot right by the sea / on the promenade in winter not much going on. Free WIFI. Not suitable for large motorhomes.

title: (12590) Casablanca -
description: Small secluded place. Free in winter, possibly for a fee in summer

title: (12592) Xilxes - Calle Cerezo
description: Xilxes has created a public parking for motorhomes that it finds located in Castelló Sud, a territory of ten municipalities that has a network of services for caravaning. This regulated public parking is located very close to the beach and has 4 spaces, without services. Other attractions include the old municipal laundry, the houses in regions devastated as a result of the destruction by the Civil War, the viewpoint, the Els Plans paella area, birdwatching and the rich gastronomy of the area, among others.

title: () Almenara - Via Camí
description: Parking with paella, fountain and Marjal. It has a bar with very rich sandwiches. Very nice area 1 km from the beach.

title: (12450) Jérica - 18 Carretera Navajas-Gaibiel
description: Parking near the reservoir dam next to a picnic area. Flat and shady very quiet at night

title: (12450) Jérica - 18 Carretera Navajas-Gaibiel
description: Parking in shady pine forest, we have not stayed overnight. Fountain with push-button faucet, in the poster of the fountain it says "water not suitable for drinking", but to get out of the way filling up for scrubbing and showering is fine.

title: (12590) Almenara -
description: Quiet car park from Almenara train station, with a small fountain 100 meters away. Illuminated at night and with the relative inconvenience of the passage of trains, this train can take us to the city of Valencia in half an hour, also to Castellon. 200 meters from the urban center, with shops, restaurants, etc. Beach at 3 kms

title: (12450) - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place at the foot of the reservoir where to spend the day. Very calm . Access with small potholes but accessible. Little shade

title: (12592) Chilches - 3 Calle Dieciséis
description: Unpaved parking in front of the sea. There is space for 2 or 3 campers. Pebbly and sandy beach, clean. Clean and warm sea. Had a nice day. Few people.  in the beach next to water to rinse your feet.

name: Camping Mediterraneo
title: (12592) Camping Mediterraneo
description: Mediterranean Camping. very quiet and motorhome friend in a natural park next to the beach site. Price for 2 extra camper 8 euros in low season.

title: (12470) Navajas - Unnamed Road
description: Isolated place where we were super calm. The path ends here so no one passes. Nice views! There is also mobile coverage. Maybe 4x4 is not 100% necessary to get there. If you want tranquility it is a great place!

title: (12100) El Grao de Castellón - 8 Avenida de las Conchas
title_short: (12100) El Grao de Castellón - 8 Avenida de las Conchas
description: Ideal place for sunny days since it has a lot of shade, it is right next to the Pinar, a place with barbecues, a place with fantastic obstacles for dogs and a park for children or to eat To the other side, 5 minutes away is the beach and public toilets.

title: (12450) Novaliches - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with plenty of parking space. At the foot of the reservoir, a very good option to come with children. To access, especially if you go with a large vehicle, come for knives and turn when you see the Tarihuela nature center sign. On the other side of the river you can see another similar area also marked on the App.

title: (12450) Novaliches - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area with picnic tables, barbecues, toilets, garbage containers and recreation area, you can see various waterfowl and at night bats come out and frogs can be heard, please use the garbage and leave it clean, consult the level of fire risk before using the bbq, we spent a very quiet night. Camping prohibited. Dogs allowed, bumpy road.

name: Caravana de Castellón
title: (12100) Caravana de Castellón
description: PARKING AND ACCOMMODATION REGULATIONS AUTHORIZED VEHICLES Cars classified as motorhomes are authorized to park on camping pitches. MAXIMUM STAY: Parking of vehicles is limited to a maximum stay of 48 hours in the same week, even if free parking spaces are available. Vehicles are parked in designated areas on the sidewalk. The use of tables, chairs, awnings, umbrellas or other similar equipment in the area is not permitted under any circumstances. The local police are responsible for monitoring the maximum 48 hours of continuous stay. Parking is prohibited in gray and black water areas. Do not use between 11 p.m. and 8 a.m. Users will respect any rule or instruction imposed by the Town Hall to maintain and preserve this catchment area and to ensure mutual respect and good neighborly relations. RESPONSIBILITIES Campers are responsible for their waste, which according to regulations must be separated for recycling and placed in the appropriate containers. there is a checkpoint and an information center with police presence, Maximum capacity: 47 campers Maximum camper length: 8 meters

title: (12450) Xèrica - Unnamed Road
description: Parking for fishermen and families who come to picnic by the lake. Fairly flat, view of the lake and the bridge where 4/5 trains pass per day. Departure possible by paddle, swimming and fishing. Very quiet at night. respect nature

title: (12590) Almenara - Camí Talponar
description: Service area with free parking for trucks, motorhomes, vans and cars. There is a 24-hour bar and gas station service just opposite. Place very passing, but well conditioned. There is a shower service for €3, from 7 am to 10 pm.

title: (12590) Casablanca -
description: Quite ok for one night. were in transit. You have your peace and only hear the sea. No direct sea view but it's just behind a hill. In the other direction mountain views. Pebble beach is ok. Sea clean many local anglers. We stood on the meadow, which was quite high and had a lot of mosquitoes and snails :D all in all, completely ok for one night.

title: (12120) Lucena del Cid -
description: Esplanade between trees where it gives a lot of shade. For several vans where a couple of hiking trails start. 50 meters below, a small picnic area with tables and a rubbish bin. Without cell phone coverage perfect to disconnect for a couple of days.

title: (12004) Castellón de la Plana - N-340
description: Wash camper at a stage. See photos.

title: (12590) Casablanca - Unnamed Road
description: Place that we found thanks to a boy who saw us a little lost. He recommended it to us and it was an absolute success. we have spent the night among the waves and the crickets and we have bathed at dusk and dawn. Path of pebbles and sand, perfect location.  Two people have been fishing at night but very well. It has no service, but a wonderful location. If we come back here, we repeat.

title: (12192) Vilafamés - 137 Carrer Colsets
description: Smooth parking perfect for sleeping and resting Quiet village backed by a castle. Climbing and tourist area. In the manor of Juvilados you can eat and have a good time, they make the best coffee with cognac.
